restrict: ◎第一階段需人工加選◎第二階段需人工加選◎加退選階段需人工加選
description: 共同科英文（一）課程為一學年課程，每學期兩學分，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此目標，本課程要求教師盡量用英語上課，努力營造一個豐富的英語環境，讓學生不但有充分機會以英語參與課堂活動，且樂於使用英語與同學及老師溝通。
goals: 增進學生英語溝通表達能力
透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神
透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野
透過課堂討論培養批判精神
提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣
syllabus:
**_English (I)_**: _Syllabus for 2021 Fall Semester_      Instructor: Sam, Shih-wen Lee

Email: [t22032@ntnu.edu.tw](mailto:t22032@cc.ntnu.edu.tw)      Office: #805, Cheng Building 8th F     Office hour: 4-6 p.m., Friday

**Course Objective:** This course aims to develop students’ English proficiency regarding all four language skills. Students are expected to improve their reading and writing literacy along with listening comprehension and speaking competence through a variety of in-class activities.

**Textbook:**  Rogers, Bruce. (2004) **_World Class Readings 1_**_: **A Reading Skills Text**._ International Ed. McGraw-Hill.

**Requirements and Rules:**

1.  **Regular class attendance** is required. The teacher will check attendance in every class meeting. Students who are absent from the class without proper reasons or leave-record will get a **2-final-point deduction** each time. Being late for over **30** minutes is treated as absence for that class meeting. If students are unable to attend the class in case of uncontrollable situations (e.g. illness, emergency, etc.), be sure to get a formal leave-record approved by the school.
2.  **Cheating on exercises or exams** is absolutely forbidden. If a student is found cheating on in-class exercises, he/she will get a zero on that specific exercise. Cheating in the midterm and final exam will result in failing the course.
3.  **Textbook** is a must. Students should bring their textbooks to every class meeting. Violation of this rule will get a **2-final-point deduction** each time (as an absence).
4.  Students should **NOT** use any electronic devices (except electronic dictionary) such as notebook computer, i-Pad, i-Pod, e-reader or smartphone during class and exam time. Violation of this rule will get a **2-final-point deduction** each time.

**Grading Policies:** Attendance: **10%**; In-class and Online Exercises: **40%**; Mid-term Exam: **25%**; Final Exam: **25****%**.

**Bonus Points:**

1.  Using multi-media lab Pu-101 may earn some bonus points (at most **5** final points).
2.  Good study records may help you get extra points in the midterm and final exam.
3.  Attending any English tests/contests given by the school will get some bonus points.
